verses.1: “Tu-in na thu ko in: Nang hong huh ding om ahi hiam? A siangthote kua penʼ lam zuan ding na hi hiam?
verses.2: Mihai pa in a hehna sih lawh a, muhdahna in sihna piangsak hi.
verses.3: Mihai pa in limtakin zungkha ngei napi, ama inn thakhatin a kizunglot ka mu ngei hi.
verses.4: A tapate suahtaksak zawh ding hi nawn lo hi. Kulh kongpi gei ah amaute kisu gawp a, amaute a hon khia ding kuamah om lo hi.
verses.5: Midangte in a neihsate liah tumsak uh a, amah sangin a hat zaw pa in a um a beel sunga a omte nangawn laksak a, a neih a lam duhgawhin a deihgawh hi.
verses.6: Leilak panin gimna hong piangtawm lo a, lei sung panin lungkhamna hong po khia tawm lo hi.
verses.7: Mei-ek a to leen mah bangin mihingte in amauʼ lungkhamna ding mah a piangsak uh hi.
verses.8: “Nang hi leng, ka Pasianʼ tungah ka thum dinga, ama tungah ka thu ka ap ding hi.
verses.9: Amah in na liante le kuama phawk zawh loh thute sem a, gen zawh lohin a lamdang na tampi a bawl hi.
verses.10: Amah in guah zusak a, lo khempeuh tui a buak hi.
verses.11: Amah in miniamte sang koih a, a dahte lungnuamsak hi.
verses.12: Amah in migiloteʼ geelna suksiatsak ahih manin amaute in a ngimna uh tangtun thei lo uh hi.
verses.13: Amah in migilote amauʼ gitlohna mahah awksak a, ngian a zangteʼ geelna zong a lumletsak hi.
verses.14: Sun thapai-in khuamial sung kidenna a, sun tangpi mahin zan bangin mial a zawt uh hi.
verses.15: Ahi zongin amah in amauʼ kiang panin pa nei lote hon khia a, mi thahatte kiang panin mi cimawhte a hon khia hi.
verses.16: Tua ahih manin mizawngte in lametna neikik uh a, thuman lo mite ahihleh kihencip hi.
verses.17: “Pasian in a taii mite mi nuamsa hizaw ahih manin, Vanglian paʼ taiina thupi san in.
verses.18: Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a liamsak hangin a liamna tunsak dinga, ama satna liamma damsak ding hi.
verses.19: Lungkhamna guk vei dong na tuahna ah amah in nang hong hon dinga, a sagih veina dingah siatna in nang hong su nawn lo ding hi.
verses.20: Kialpi sungin sih nading pan nang hong hon khia dinga, gal sungah namsau panin nang hong suaktasak ding hi.
verses.21: Gensiatna panin nang hong kihu dinga, siatna hong tun ciangin na lau kei ding hi.
verses.22: Suksiat ding le puksih dingte na nuihsan lel dinga, leitung gamsate na kihta kei ding hi.
verses.23: Bang hang hiam cih leh na lo sungah suang om lo dinga, gamlak gamsate in hong su lo ding hi.
verses.24: Na inn sungah lunghihmawhna ding om lo hi, ci-in na thei dinga, na inn kiim na et ciangin a kitasam bangmah om lo ding hi.
verses.25: Na suan na khakte tampi tak pha ding hi, ci-in na thei dinga, na sunga piangte leitung lopa zah pha ding hi, ci-in na thei ding hi.
verses.26: A hun ciangin ancilna phualah buhlom a tun mah bangin teek sihin han na zuan ding hi.
verses.27: Hih thute khempeuh ka kantel uh a, a thuman a na hi hi. Hih thute ka zak sa uh hi a, a manna na thei ding hi,” a ci hi.
